name: big
tagline: FULL-SERVICE AD AGENCY THAT IS JUST THE RIGHT SIZE
description:
We’re big. But not that kind of big. We’re a full-service ad agency located in Charlotte, NC, made up of passionate thinkers and doers that used to work at large agencies, but now work here. You get the benefits of big thinking, without the hassle of big bills, egos, and corporate structure. We’ll save you the buzzwords about developing integrated brand experiences through a patented creative process that inspire a multifaceted target audience in a post-digital world.
We don’t know what that means either. We prefer to have our work do the talking. We love advertising. We love people. And we love sweet tea. Looks like we’re in the right place.
